title: Frontend Core UI: Expense and Category Management
description: Build React + Vite + Tailwind UI for expense entry/edit/delete, category management, and expense filtering with backend API integration.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create, edit, and delete expenses from the UI.
Users can create, edit, and delete categories from the UI.
Expense list supports filtering by date range and category.
Loading and error states are shown for API requests.
Delete actions require explicit user confirmation.
